list.name: now
list.query: SELECT temperature FROM "forecast" where time > now() limit 1

targets.query: SELECT mean("temperature") FROM "forecast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "temperature" WHERE ("deviceName" = 'Craftown - Console') and '$location' = 'home' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "deviceName" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "dewPoint" WHERE $timeFilter and '$location' = 'home' GROUP BY time($__interval), "deviceName" fill(null)

SELECT last("temperature") FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "location" = '$location' and "source" = '$source' and $timeFilter and "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("dewpoint") FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "location" = '$location' and "source" = '$source' and $timeFilter and "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "feelsLike" WHERE ("deviceName" = 'Craftown - Console') AND '$location' = 'home' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "deviceName" fill(null)
SELECT mean("sun_up") *-10 FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'visualcrossing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT max("precipIntensity") FROM "forecast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("sky_cover") FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "location" = '$location' AND "source" = '$source' AND $timeFilter AND "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("precipitation_amount") FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "location" = '$location'AND "source" = '$source' AND $timeFilter AND "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("precipitation_probability") FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "location" = '$location' AND "source" = '$source' AND $timeFilter AND "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sun_up") FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'visualcrossing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT cumulative_sum(max("precipitation_amount")) FROM "forecast2" WHERE "precipitation_probability" > 0.2 and "location" = '$location' AND "source" = '$source' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

SELECT cumulative_sum(max("precipitation_amount")) FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "precipitation_probability" > 0.2 and "location" = '$location' and "source" = '$source' and $timeFilter and "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(max("value"))) FROM "monthlyrainin" WHERE '$location' = 'home' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sun_up") FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'visualcrossing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT last("wind_speed") FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "location" = '$location' and "source" = '$source' and $timeFilter and "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sun_up") *-10 FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'visualcrossing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT max("value") FROM "windgustmph" WHERE '$location' = 'home' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("wind_direction") FROM "forecast_history"."forecast_history2" WHERE "location" = '$location' and $timeFilter and "forecast_time" > $__from - $compare * 3600000 and "forecast_time" < $__from - ($compare * 3600000) + 3600000 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sun_up") FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'visualcrossing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "winddir" WHERE '$location' = 'home' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("full_moon_ratio") FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'visualcrossing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("moon_up") FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'theglobalweather') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("sun_up") FROM "astronomy" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "source" = 'visualcrossing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

list.definition: show tag values on ecobee from forecast2 with key = "location"
